scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, his head bowed and wearing a loincloth. Above him, the inscription "INRI" is visible. To his left stands the Virgin Mary, her hands clasped in sorrow, and to his right stands Saint John the Evangelist, holding a book. The background features stylized architectural elements, suggesting a city or buildings, and a decorative arch frames the composition.
